Text: Enron Corps products in Japanese French GermanDear Mr Lay Just wanted to drop you a note to find out if Enron Corp is interested in forming a collaboration with our company GlobalVision International Inc is a software and Internet localization and translation specialist We partner with our clients to enable them reach their global markets We are staffed and equipped to convert your products and Internet pages from English to Japanese French German Spanish Italian Chinese Korean Russian Arabic and other languages If there is interest on your part please do not hesitate to forward this message or to contact us as listed below Sincerely Greta Tomova GlobalVision International Inc Coolidge Rd Suite Berlin MA Tel Fax Software and Internet Localization
